relevant_findings.general: Well, no acute distress (NAD), alert and oriented (A&O), cooperative
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm (RRR), no rubs/gallops/murmurs (R/G/M)
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, non-distended (ND), focally tender in right upper quadrant (RUQ) to palpation with positive ___ sign. No rebound tenderness, positive voluntary guarding, no costal margin tenderness.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well-perfused (WWP) bilaterally lower extremities (BLE), no appreciable edema
